thread.title: Sateesh Babu Vasa
thread.title_full: HairCareAndBeauty.com reviewed by Sateesh Babu Vasa

author: Sateesh Babu Vasa
title: Sateesh Babu Vasa
text: Received the product on time and the product is as described on the site. The price of the product is little bit lesser than the same product on other sites such as amazon, ebay. I recommend this site for my friends and family to order any product.
